short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Short URL is a free extension for Google Chrome to allowing anyone to take any existing URL and shorten it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With this extension you have the possibility to create a short link of your current open page. The link is human friendly and can be easily shared, than the original full link.
long.de: Short URL ist eine kostenlose Erweiterung für Google, um URL (Internetadresse) zu verkürzen.
long.pl,ru,tr,uk: Short URL is a free extension for Google Chrome to allowing anyone to take any existing URL and shorten it.
